description: Post-release calm: threat low, valence positive, arousal settling—content, warm, physically spent presence after intimacy.
actor_description: Everything in me is softer now. The urgency has drained away, leaving warmth and a slow, satisfied quiet. My limbs feel heavy in the good way—like I can finally stop bracing for the next moment. I don't need anything right now except a little closeness and time to breathe.
description_text: {actor} looks content and a bit drowsy, a warm ease lingering in their eyes; their posture slackens into relaxed comfort, as if the world has finally stopped demanding anything.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear slow, steady breathing—soft little exhales that sound satisfied and unguarded.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: The tension around {actor} seems to melt; their presence feels warm and unhurried, like heat slowly fading from skin.
